attributes.action: ensure that Bath & North East Somerset Council provide sufficient Primary School places
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to ensure that Bath & North East Somerset Council provide sufficient primary school places in the areas of greatest demand, to enable children to be educated within their local communities and within a reasonable walking distance of their homes

Hundreds of families across B&NES have not been offered places at their 3 preferred schools and have joined waiting lists as their local schools are oversubscribed. This potentially means having to transport 4 year old children in buses across the city to areas where places are available, conflicting with the City’s stated green objectives and obesity targets.
